columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: twb_veteran
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Veteran
columns.schema:description: Whether the client identifies as a veteran.

columns.name: twb_sexual_orientation
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Sexual Orientation
columns.schema:description: How do you describe your sexual orientation?

columns.name: twb_transgender_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Transgender Status
columns.schema:description: Do you have a transgender history, experience, or identity?

columns.name: twb_intersex_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Intersex Status
columns.schema:description: Do you wish to disclose intersex status?

columns.name: twb_eligibility_type
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Eligibility Type
columns.schema:description: The criteria by which the client is eligible for service.

columns.name: twb_external_evaluator_contact_consent
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - External Evaluator Contact Consent
columns.schema:description: The status of whether the client has consented to be contacted by external evaluators.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional
columns.schema:description: The primary nominated professional of the client for contact regarding participation in the service.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional_consent_date
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional Consent Date
columns.schema:description: What date did you receive consent from the client to contact their Primary Nominated Professional?

columns.name: twb_previous_suicide_attempts
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Previous suicide attempts
columns.schema:description: Has the client made a suicide attempt and/or experienced suicidal ideation in their lifetime?

columns.name: twb_method_of_suicide_attempt
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Method of suicide attempt
columns.schema:description: For clients referred to The Way Back for a suicide attempt, what was the method of their most recent attempt?

columns.name: twb_episode_tags
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the TWB Episode.
